AND c.commodity_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{param.inventory_commodity_name},'%')
AND c.commodity_manufacturer LIKE CONCAT('%',#{param.inventory_manufacturer},'%')
AND c.commodity_category LIKE CONCAT('%',#{param.inventory_category},'%')
AND i.inventory_tenant_id = #{param.inventory_tenant_id}
